about_the_game:
A package of goods for those who wish to go the extra mile to support the developers of Deadside.

Includes:

  • 18 additional SafeZone storage slots
  • Supporter skins for starter items:
    - Knife
    - Lighter
  • Additional items:
    - Walkie-talkie
    - Compass
    - Binoculars
    - Flask
  • Camo skin for starter t-shirt

This list will expand with the ongoing develompent of the Deadside, stay tuned for more.

And thank you very much for your support!

name: Deadside Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD FX
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030 / RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: A package of goods for those who wish to go the extra mile to support the developers of Deadside.
